p: To confirm the reliability of RNA-Seq in identification of differentially expressed genes under salt stress, we performed the qPCR analysis of 10 randomly selected unigenes at salinity levels of ECe ~ 30 dS/m, ECe ~ 40 dS/m and ECe ~ 50 dS/m. A similar expression level was observed between qPCR results and RNA-Seq data but with some variations (Fig. 8). The results confirmed the reliability of RNAseq analysis. The qPCR expression analysis was performed to identify if pathways of the selected genes were involved in providing high-salinity tolerance to Urochondra.
